price: Wͻn mu bi wͻ hͻ a wͻtie woͻ. Enti wobɛtumi ama asosifoͻ ate asεm, sε wͻnte asεm ase mpo a?
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yastamiʿūna ilayka afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma walaw kānū lā yaʿqilūna
